dct_title_s: Map of Turkey in Europe, illustrating the Berlin Congress Treaty, July, 1878
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Shows new and proposed boundaries, cities, rivers, etc. Insets: Map of Armenia to illustrate articles 58, 59, 60 of the Treaty of Berlin -- A map showing the relation of Cyprus to the adjacent coasts. From: Mitchell's new general atlas. Philadelphia : S. Augustus Mitchell, 1880, c1879.
